channel.title: PAR:RI on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in PAR:RI on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Pernod Shares Jump Most in a Year After Earnings Beat Estimates
item.description: Pernod Ricard SA shares soared after reporting results that topped analyst expectations and forecasting a pickup in demand as trade restrictions eased in its key market China.
